main event: A former USAF colonel reported a UFO sighting in 1950, describing the object as extremely fast and potentially unnoticed without direct observation.
interesting points: The observer was outdoors at Camp Carson, Colorado, when the sighting occurred., The object was estimated to have traveled at a speed of 500 to 800 MPH and possibly up to 1000 MPH., The witness stated that if they hadn't been looking at the object, it would have gone unnoticed., The sighting lasted approximately 35 to 45 seconds., The report states one other person, a sergeant, was present who also observed the object for a few seconds.
witness description: a retired USAF colonel with a background in hunting and amateur astronomy
